verse: वृषभानु सुता देवी मूलः प्रकृति ईश्वरी

terms.वृषभानु: Referring to Lord Krishna, who is known as the descendant of King Vrishabanu in his human form.
terms.ईश्वरी: Supreme female deity, the ruling deity

meaning: Meaning:The daughter of Lord Krishna, who is the origin of all manifestations, is the supreme goddess ruling over the material world.
